title: Improved self-supervised learning for disease identification in chest X-ray images
details: Y Ma, S Dong, Y Jiang - Journal of Electronic Imaging, 2024
abstract: The utilization of chest X-ray (CXR) image data analysis for assisting in disease diagnosis is an important application of artificial intelligence. Supervised learning faces challenges due to a lack of large-scale labeled datasets and inaccuracies. Self …
